title: Add app logo to Empty State screen

requirements.summary: Show the existing app logo on the landing/empty-state screen using the generated logo asset and responsive placement.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app first loads and the Empty State screen is shown, the logo is visible on that screen (in addition to the header).
The logo uses `/assets/generated/weather-logo.dim_512x512.png` and includes an appropriate English `alt` text (e.g., "Weather Gizmos logo").
Logo placement is responsive (looks good on mobile and desktop) and does not overlap the existing hero image, heading, body text, or the Search button.

file_operations.description: Add a centered logo image element referencing `frontend/public/assets/generated/weather-logo.dim_512x512.png` with English alt text (e.g., "Weather Gizmos logo"), positioned in the Empty State layout so it remains responsive and does not overlap the existing hero image, text, or Search button.
